amendment.description: To modify the limitation on availability of funds for Department of Defense participation in multinational military centers of excellence.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4358 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4358 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S6117-6122; text: CR S6122) To modify the limitation on availability of funds for Department of Defense participation in multinational military centers of excellence.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4358 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4358 proposed by Senator Warner.
